sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

sentences.chinese: 搬新家是件很劳心的事。

sentences.chinese: 三十岁之前，我训练后从不会感到身体发僵。

sentences.english: The staff were very good.
sentences.chinese: 员工们都很棒。

sentences.chinese: 10名员工被分派做这项任务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全体职员，员工；工作人员；参谋
detailed_translations.english: the people who work for an organization

sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.chinese: 野营用的东西都在哪儿？

sentences.chinese: 汽车翻下了悬崖边。

sentences.chinese: 实验非常成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物
detailed_translations.english: when you achieve what you want or intend

sentences.english: The operation was successful.
sentences.chinese: 手术成功了。

sentences.english: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
sentences.chinese: 十分成功的会议

sentences.chinese: 委员会成员举行了闭门会议。

sentences.chinese: 英国人没有打算作出让步。

sentences.chinese: 同意给该岛的进出口特许权

sentences.chinese: 摘要另写一页。

a summary report, statement etc gives the main facts in a report etc without any of the details or explanations

sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.chinese: 食物在夏天必须加以冷藏。

sentences.chinese: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

sentences.chinese: 两位总统商定在春天举行一次首脑会议。

sentences.chinese: 五国峰会

sentences.english: supplementary information
sentences.chinese: 补充信息

detailed_translations.english: provided in addition to what already exists

sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.chinese: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that is available to be used

sentences.english: The bill was supported by a large majority in the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者

sentences.english: My family were very supportive throughout the divorce.
sentences.chinese: 离婚过程中我的家人自始至终都很支持我。

sentences.chinese: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.chinese: 我喜欢他的微笑和他的网球！

sentences.english: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.chinese: 要是她决定和她姐姐一起出去，那我就能和你去打网球。

sentences.chinese: 铁路隧道

sentences.english: the Channel Tunnel (= between England and France )
sentences.chinese: 〔英吉利〕海峡隧道

sentences.english: I’ve got toothache .
sentences.chinese: 我牙痛。

sentences.chinese: 昨晚我一整夜牙疼得厉害。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in a tooth

sentences.english: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.english: The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.chinese: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

detailed_translations.english: the vehicles moving along a road or street

sentences.chinese: …地球上的生命形态。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地球的；陆地的，[生物] 陆生的；人间的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the Earth rather than to the moon or other  planets

sentences.chinese: 小儿麻痹症疫苗

sentences.english: Doctors worried that there would not be enough vaccine for everyone who needed it.
sentences.chinese: 医生担心没有足够的疫苗给每个需要的人。

sentences.english: I vacuumed the carpets today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天用吸尘器清洁地毯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集； 用真空吸尘器打扫
detailed_translations.english: to clean using a vacuum cleaner
a space that is completely empty of all gas, especially one from which all the air has been taken away

sentences.english: The waitress has offered her services to us.
sentences.chinese: 这个女服务生已经向我们自荐了。

sentences.chinese: 苏珊：如果德国人在美国向女服务员伸出大拇指点汽水，她可能会以为他对她有意思呢！

sentences.english: At the tiny restaurant where Xinran eats lunch, the waitress tries to kill herself twice, each time after a little girl’s birthday party.
sentences.chinese: 在欣然吃午饭的小餐馆中，有个女服务员曾两次试图自杀。 每次都是在一个小女孩的生日聚会之后。

sentences.english: The willow trees cast their shadows all around.
sentences.chinese: 柳荫匝地。

sentences.english: He worships that big willow south of the house.
sentences.chinese: 他很崇拜房子南面的那颗大柳树。

sentences.english: He has also captured pollen from alder, pine and willow.
sentences.chinese: 他还从桤树、松树和柳树上捕捉到了花粉。

sentences.chinese: 对付杂草的长期斗争

sentences.english: I've been weeding the flower beds.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在除花坛里的杂草。

to remove unwanted plants from a garden or other place

sentences.english: Put some more wood on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.english: a polished wood floor
sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.english: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子是木头盖的。
